prompt_text: Professional blog header image showing a complete gecko terrarium setup with plants, branches, and proper lighting. Clean modern photography style with soft natural lighting.
Warm editorial photograph of hands gently holding a small crested gecko. Caring and educational atmosphere, soft focus background, realistic photography.
Close-up editorial photo of a healthy active gecko on a branch, showing clear eyes and alert posture. Natural colors, educational style, soft lighting.
Scenic landscape photo of Madagascar rainforest habitat with endemic gecko species visible. National Geographic style nature photography.
Educational flat-lay photo showing correct gecko feeding setup with insects and supplements. Clean overhead shot, organized presentation.
Detailed macro photo of nutritious feeder insects dusted with calcium powder. Clean white background, product photography style.
Informative flat-lay arrangement of various gecko food items, supplements, and feeding tools. Clean organized composition, bright natural lighting.
Clinical but warm photo of gecko health examination setup with care supplies. Professional veterinary style, clean and trustworthy.
Welcoming photo of a beautiful gecko terrarium from an appealing angle. Inviting beginner-friendly aesthetic, warm lighting.
Professional photo of gecko breeding documentation and certificates on a desk. Clean business-like presentation, organized aesthetic.
Step-by-step visual of terrarium assembly with substrate, plants and equipment. Clean instructional photography style, bright even lighting.
Detailed realistic illustration of Rhacodactylus auriculatus (Gargoyle Gecko) on bark. Scientific illustration style with natural colors and accurate details.
Beautiful realistic photo of Correlophus ciliatus (Crested Gecko) on moss. Natural habitat setting, sharp focus, nature documentary quality.
Detailed photo of Ptychozoon kuhli (Kuhl's Flying Gecko) showing patagium. Natural lighting, scientific documentation style, accurate colors.
High-quality photo of Eublepharis macularius (Leopard Gecko) on desert sand. Clean background, showing distinctive spotted pattern, professional pet photography.
Vibrant photo of Gekko gecko (Tokay Gecko) with characteristic blue and orange coloring on tree bark. Bold colors, nature photography style.
Professional photo of Rhacodactylus leachianus (New Caledonian Giant Gecko). Largest gecko species, impressive scale, detailed texture visible.
